<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return a mask with Count low bits set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/#a68b124522ab0fdc7148417fb06f0e93e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/#a68b124522ab0fdc7148417fb06f0e93e">allOnes</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> &lt;= 64);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> &gt; 63)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint64&#95;t(1) &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>) - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Represents operands 2 to 5 of the ROTATE AND ... SELECTED BITS operation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// given by Opcode.  The operands are: Input (R2), Start (I3), End (I4) and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rotate (I5).  The combined operand value is effectively:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (or (rotl Input, Rotate), ~Mask)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for RNSBG and:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (and (rotl Input, Rotate), Mask)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// otherwise.  The output value has BitSize bits, although Input may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// narrower (in which case the upper bits are don&#39;t care), or wider (in which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case the result will be truncated as part of the operation).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/rxsbgoperands"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/rxsbgoperands/#a4b2d6d1e99db7d3b107024307650bc0d">RxSBGOperands</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to match Addr as an address with a base, 12-bit displacement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and index, where the index is element Elem of a vector.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The base or index of AM is equivalent to Op0 + Op1, where IsBase selects</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between the base and index.  Try to fold Op1 into AM&#39;s displacement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464" lineLink="#a8054b3854a083e947e97f07f6a5fd396"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a8054b3854a083e947e97f07f6a5fd396">expandDisp</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/systemzaddressingmode/#a7fa44be2ee6462084a459d193231e2ae">SystemZAddressingMode</a> &amp;AM, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsBase,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Op0, uint64&#95;t Op1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First try adjusting the displacement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t TestDisp = AM.Disp + Op1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a2fa6af6bfd047fb63d886637fe12e498">selectDisp</a>(AM.DR, TestDisp)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a0524144f93dd6479626daa0354221241">changeComponent</a>(AM, IsBase, Op0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AM.Disp = TestDisp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We could consider forcing the displacement into a register and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using it as an index, but it would need to be carefully tuned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543" lineLink="#ab40a430aafd22186cbdbd94ec923b02b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ab40a430aafd22186cbdbd94ec923b02b">shouldUseLA</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>, int64&#95;t Disp, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;Index) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Always use LA(Y) for frame addresses, since we know that the destination</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register is almost always (perhaps always) going to be different from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the frame register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>-&gt;getOpcode() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a4b437632fd9b97dd36010d85eb363efe">ISD::FrameIndex</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Disp) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Always use LA(Y) if there is a base, displacement and index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Index)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Always use LA if the displacement is small enough.  It should always</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be no worse than AGHI (and better if it avoids a move).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a87e65296f2a6d9570117a852af342764">isUInt&lt;12&gt;</a>(Disp))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For similar reasons, always use LAY if the constant is too big for AGHI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LAY should be no worse than AGFI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;16&gt;</a>(Disp))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t use LA for plain registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Index)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t use LA for plain addition if the index operand is only used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// once.  It should be a natural two-operand addition in that case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Index-&gt;hasOneUse())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prefer addition if the second operation is sign-extended, in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hope of using AGF.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IndexOpcode = Index-&gt;getOpcode();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IndexOpcode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a5183f3d72924bc7c77ba8d3f5de9f602">ISD::SIGN&#95;EXTEND</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">        IndexOpcode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aaa59dd5ec37f21905436b354c0292d9e">ISD::SIGN&#95;EXTEND&#95;INREG</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t use LA for two-operand addition if either operand is only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used once.  The addition instructions are better in that case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>-&gt;hasOneUse())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return true if Addr is suitable for AM, updating AM if so.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SystemZDAGToDAGISel::selectAddress(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Addr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/systemzaddressingmode/#a7fa44be2ee6462084a459d193231e2ae">SystemZAddressingMode</a> &amp;AM)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start out assuming that the address will need to be loaded separately,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First try treating the address as a constant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Addr.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aac2f0a84dd2aa5ee4c3f1385e9565f5e">ISD::Constant</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantSDNode&gt;</a>(Addr)-&gt;getSExtValue()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also see if it&#39;s a bare ADJDYNALLOC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Addr.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemzisd/#a24fe7decb4ebdd8b4c7a774d65fcaa7ea7cc4d76410ab83f7f6b9d4953f0a23a5">SystemZISD::ADJDYNALLOC</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise try expanding each component.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (expandAddress(AM, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">           (AM.Index.getNode() &amp;&amp; expandAddress(AM, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reject cases where it isn&#39;t profitable to use LA(Y).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AM.Form == <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/systemzaddressingmode/#a969035fc5f3c7c1f1cffad2840640204aa813c469fae459b8f069104058626db7">SystemZAddressingMode::FormBDXLA</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">      !<a href="#ab40a430aafd22186cbdbd94ec923b02b">shouldUseLA</a>(AM.Base.getNode(), AM.Disp, AM.Index.getNode()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reject cases where the other instruction in a pair should be used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a585775891613ee08dcba83bd7c407162">isValidDisp</a>(AM.DR, AM.Disp))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AM.isDynAlloc() &amp;&amp; !AM.IncludesDynAlloc)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert a node into the DAG at least before Pos.  This will reposition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the node as needed, and will assign it a node ID that is &lt;= Pos&#39;s ID.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that this does &#42;not&#42; preserve the uniqueness of node IDs!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The selection DAG must no longer depend on their uniqueness when this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function is used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638" lineLink="#ae61c505ef5dc38733d7b12b91e545a44"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ae61c505ef5dc38733d7b12b91e545a44">insertDAGNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &#42;DAG, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;Pos, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a483127dd84f9da223f9fe5d20a0367a8">SelectionDAGISel::getUninvalidatedNodeId</a>(Pos))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#aed6667e93ace54abed8e4432b7b88927">RepositionNode</a>(Pos-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.getNode());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SystemZDAGToDAGISel::getAddressOperands(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/systemzaddressingmode/#a7fa44be2ee6462084a459d193231e2ae">SystemZAddressingMode</a> &amp;AM,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;Disp)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> = AM.Base;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>.getNode())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Register 0 means &quot;no base&quot;.  This is mostly useful for shifts.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re only interested in cases where the insertion is into some operand</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Treat (srl X, count), mask) as (and (rotl X, size-count), ~0&gt;&gt;count),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which is similar to SLL above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!refineRxSBGMask(RxSBG, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/#a68b124522ab0fdc7148417fb06f0e93e">allOnes</a>(BitSize - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RxSBG.Rotate = (RxSBG.Rotate - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>) &amp; 63;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RxSBG.Input = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/rxsbgoperands/#a4b2d6d1e99db7d3b107024307650bc0d">RxSBGOperands</a> RISBG(SystemZ::RISBG, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, 0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (expandRxSBG(RISBG))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The widening or narrowing is expected to be free.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Counting widening or narrowing as a saved operation will result in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preferring an R&#42;SBG over a simple shift/logical instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RISBG.Input.getOpcode() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a27d5d8ef82302b739ba3ca8be1a5513d">ISD::ANY&#95;EXTEND</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RISBG.Input.getOpcode() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ae690127648393001a7d5b93dc23da7b3">ISD::TRUNCATE</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> += 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> == 0 || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ConstantSDNode&gt;</a>(RISBG.Input))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prefer to use normal shift instructions over RISBG, since they can handle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all cases and are sometimes shorter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> == 1 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOpcode() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ac513a7da1bf74fb3e3c594da8534f2d2">ISD::AND</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prefer LOAD LOGICAL INDEXED ADDRESS over RISBG in the case where we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can use its displacement to pull in an addition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Subtarget-&gt;hasMiscellaneousExtensions4() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RISBG.Rotate &gt;= 1 &amp;&amp; RISBG.Rotate &lt;= 4 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RISBG.Mask == (((uint64&#95;t)1 &lt;&lt; 32) - 1) &lt;&lt; RISBG.Rotate &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RISBG.Input.getOpcode() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantSDNode&gt;</a>(RISBG.Input.getOperand(1)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;20&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;getSExtValue()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prefer register extensions like LLC over RISBG.  Also prefer to start</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// out with normal ANDs if one instruction would be enough.  We can convert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// these ANDs into an RISBG later if a three-address instruction is useful.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RISBG.Rotate == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PreferAnd = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prefer AND for any 32-bit and-immediate operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VT == MVT::i32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PreferAnd = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As well as for any 64-bit operation that can be implemented via LLC(R),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLH(R), LLGT(R), or one of the and-immediate instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RISBG.Mask == 255 ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlight">             RISBG.Mask == 65535 ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlight">             RISBG.Mask == 2147483647 ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#ad04536b57e902c1325e42672d3446d9f">SystemZ::isImmLF</a>(~RISBG.Mask) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a784733db49f741774a8d9dc6e29376a7">SystemZ::isImmHF</a>(~RISBG.Mask))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><span class="doxyHighlight">     PreferAnd = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And likewise for the LLZRGF instruction, which doesn&#39;t have a register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to register version.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Load = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadSDNode&gt;</a>(RISBG.Input)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spii/#ad2b7483c625986ac800ae1c31ae4cce7a5069619ca8fdce305534f3fe85091a0f">Load</a>-&gt;getMemoryVT() == MVT::i32 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spii/#ad2b7483c625986ac800ae1c31ae4cce7a5069619ca8fdce305534f3fe85091a0f">Load</a>-&gt;getExtensionType() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#ad4d48171b87ca51ff54c10a436bac4d7afab3fffd153f7d7770fed81272e4b78f">ISD::EXTLOAD</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spii/#ad2b7483c625986ac800ae1c31ae4cce7a5069619ca8fdce305534f3fe85091a0f">Load</a>-&gt;getExtensionType() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#ad4d48171b87ca51ff54c10a436bac4d7a8d89c7da4444d9ec11667aa369abc5f7">ISD::ZEXTLOAD</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">          RISBG.Mask == 4294967040 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Subtarget-&gt;hasLoadAndZeroRightmostByte())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PreferAnd = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PreferAnd) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace the current node with an AND.  Note that the current node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// might already be that same AND, in which case it is already CSE&#39;d</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with it, and we must not call ReplaceNode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a5fa7b4069ef3bd1ceb9f2caa315cf5ac">In</a> = convertTo(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, VT, RISBG.Input);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a> = CurDAG-&gt;getConstant(RISBG.Mask, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, VT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#a851a17f7dc73f9988807242926dcc645a03c2e7e41ffc181a4e84080b4710e81e">New</a> = CurDAG-&gt;getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ac513a7da1bf74fb3e3c594da8534f2d2">ISD::AND</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, VT, In, Mask);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#a851a17f7dc73f9988807242926dcc645a03c2e7e41ffc181a4e84080b4710e81e">New</a>.getNode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#ae61c505ef5dc38733d7b12b91e545a44">insertDAGNode</a>(CurDAG, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, Mask);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#ae61c505ef5dc38733d7b12b91e545a44">insertDAGNode</a>(CurDAG, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, New);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ReplaceNode(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#a851a17f7dc73f9988807242926dcc645a03c2e7e41ffc181a4e84080b4710e81e">New</a>.getNode());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#a851a17f7dc73f9988807242926dcc645a03c2e7e41ffc181a4e84080b4710e81e">New</a>.getNode();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now, select the machine opcode to implement this operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;isMachineOpcode())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SelectCode(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode = SystemZ::RISBG;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prefer RISBGN if available, since it does not clobber CC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Subtarget-&gt;hasMiscellaneousExtensions())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Opcode = SystemZ::RISBGN;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> OpcodeVT = MVT::i64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VT == MVT::i32 &amp;&amp; Subtarget-&gt;hasHighWord() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can only use the 32-bit instructions if all source bits are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the low 32 bits without wrapping, both after rotation (because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the smaller range for Start and End) and before rotation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (because the input value is truncated).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RISBG.Start &gt;= 32 &amp;&amp; RISBG.End &gt;= RISBG.Start &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ((RISBG.Start + RISBG.Rotate) &amp; 63) &gt;= 32 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ((RISBG.End + RISBG.Rotate) &amp; 63) &gt;=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ((RISBG.Start + RISBG.Rotate) &amp; 63)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Opcode = SystemZ::RISBMux;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OpcodeVT = MVT::i32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RISBG.Start &amp;= 31;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RISBG.End &amp;= 31;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a926d7ce2143863b7a2afda0fca4d2b65">Ops</a>&#91;5&#93; = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">    getUNDEF(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, OpcodeVT),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">    convertTo(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, OpcodeVT, RISBG.Input),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurDAG-&gt;getTargetConstant(RISBG.Start, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, MVT::i32),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurDAG-&gt;getTargetConstant(RISBG.End | 128, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, MVT::i32),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurDAG-&gt;getTargetConstant(RISBG.Rotate, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, MVT::i32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#a851a17f7dc73f9988807242926dcc645a03c2e7e41ffc181a4e84080b4710e81e">New</a> = convertTo(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, VT, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>(CurDAG-&gt;getMachineNode(Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, OpcodeVT, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a926d7ce2143863b7a2afda0fca4d2b65">Ops</a>), 0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ReplaceNode(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#a851a17f7dc73f9988807242926dcc645a03c2e7e41ffc181a4e84080b4710e81e">New</a>.getNode());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SystemZDAGToDAGISel::tryRxSBG(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> VT = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getValueType(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#af975bf04c49cc895cfe38e7dc126a2f1">isInteger</a>() || VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>() &gt; 64)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try treating each operand of N as the second operand of the RxSBG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and see which goes deepest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/rxsbgoperands/#a4b2d6d1e99db7d3b107024307650bc0d">RxSBGOperands</a> RxSBG&#91;&#93; = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/rxsbgoperands/#a4b2d6d1e99db7d3b107024307650bc0d">RxSBGOperands</a>(Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(0)),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/rxsbgoperands/#a4b2d6d1e99db7d3b107024307650bc0d">RxSBGOperands</a>(Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123; 0, 0 &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; 2; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RxSBG&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/classes/input">Input</a>-&gt;hasOneUse() &amp;&amp; expandRxSBG(RxSBG&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In cases of multiple users it seems better to keep the simple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction as they are one cycle faster, and it also helps in cases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where both inputs share a common node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The widening or narrowing is expected to be free.  Counting widening</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or narrowing as a saved operation will result in preferring an R&#42;SBG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// over a simple shift/logical instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RxSBG&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/classes/input">Input</a>.getOpcode() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a27d5d8ef82302b739ba3ca8be1a5513d">ISD::ANY&#95;EXTEND</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">          RxSBG&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.Input.getOpcode() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ae690127648393001a7d5b93dc23da7b3">ISD::TRUNCATE</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; += 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do nothing if neither operand is suitable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>&#91;0&#93; == 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>&#91;1&#93; == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pick the deepest second operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>&#91;0&#93; &gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>&#91;1&#93; ? 0 : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Op0 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> ^ 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prefer IC for character insertions from memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == SystemZ::ROSBG &amp;&amp; (RxSBG&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.Mask &amp; 0xff) == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Load = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadSDNode&gt;</a>(Op0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>()))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getMachineNode(TargetOpcode::COPY&#95;TO&#95;REGCLASS,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1871"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, Index.getValueType(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1872"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       Index, RC), 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OutOps.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OutOps.push&#95;back(Disp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OutOps.push&#95;back(Index);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IsProfitableToFold - Returns true if is profitable to fold the specific</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operand node N of U during instruction selection that starts at Root.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/systemzdagtodagisel/#a5c013753f05b14d6d638ffe65860c6f1"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/systemzdagtodagisel/#a5c013753f05b14d6d638ffe65860c6f1">SystemZDAGToDAGISel::IsProfitableToFold</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;U,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;Root)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to avoid folding a LOAD into an ICMP node if as a result</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we would be forced to spill the condition code into a GPR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.getOpcode() == ISD::LOAD &amp;&amp; U-&gt;getOpcode() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemzisd/#a24fe7decb4ebdd8b4c7a774d65fcaa7ea492cf44e417890c9ec7a8138e26d23a7">SystemZISD::ICMP</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.hasOneUse() || !U-&gt;hasOneUse())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The user of the CC value will usually be a CopyToReg into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// physical CC register, which in turn is glued and chained to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// actual instruction that uses the CC value.  Bail out if we have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// anything else than that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;CCUser = &#42;U-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#ae04dc684fcd3d20b890bbf44e4a28395">user&#95;begin</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;CCRegUser = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1901"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CCUser-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a23f2f5947fc429aff1270651c6d019ea">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a93bc27ca4d9e211c54b0d9efb660f080">ISD::CopyToReg</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1902"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;RegisterSDNode&gt;</a>(CCUser-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a8388f666d6e735f35837ad03ed1f7a7a">getOperand</a>(1))-&gt;getReg() == SystemZ::CC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1903"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;U : CCUser-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#ad5596cf1822f4cc9e37fb75b6dff630f">users</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1904"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CCRegUser == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1905"><span class="doxyHighlight">          CCRegUser = U;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1906"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CCRegUser != U)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1907"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1908"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1909"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1910"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CCRegUser == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1911"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the actual instruction is a branch, the only thing that remains to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// checked is whether the CCUser chain is a predecessor of the load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CCRegUser-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a1223d6e9a7dfb6e51299b894beccc679">isMachineOpcode</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CCRegUser-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a7f96a3399d86d6f136aaa121de4217a3">getMachineOpcode</a>() == SystemZ::BRC)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;isPredecessorOf(CCUser-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a8388f666d6e735f35837ad03ed1f7a7a">getOperand</a>(0).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1919"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, the instruction may have multiple operands, and we need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1920"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// verify that none of them are a predecessor of the load.  This is exactly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1921"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same check that would be done by common code if the CC setter were</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1922"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// glued to the CC user, so simply invoke that check here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1923"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a98c172c9b66de1264ee2123e4f1a3df2">IsLegalToFold</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, U, CCRegUser, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a5386ceeb71599848944185c0035e0e94">OptLevel</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1924"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1931"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Represents a sequence for extracting a 0/1 value from an IPM result:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1933" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/ipmconversion"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/ipmconversion/#ac9b8b45ddc556a9fa8375d7b8695fcd5">IPMConversion</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
