<Link id="l01942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1942"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return a sequence for getting a 1 from an IPM result when CC has a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1944"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value in CCMask and a 0 when CC has a value in CCValid &amp; ~CCMask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1945"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The handling of CC values outside CCValid doesn&#39;t matter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1946" lineLink="#a28e0a0edbf89edb6e77b86a94974848d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/ipmconversion/#ac9b8b45ddc556a9fa8375d7b8695fcd5">IPMConversion</a> <a href="#a28e0a0edbf89edb6e77b86a94974848d">getIPMConversion</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CCValid, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CCMask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1947"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Deal with cases where the result can be taken directly from a bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1948"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the IPM result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1949"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CCMask == (CCValid &amp; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a3e4f7a3f70ff22719bebc0dedfa6f5d4">SystemZ::CCMASK&#95;1</a> | <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#abfe77bb849cf01dbc4b6fc10e091395e">SystemZ::CCMASK&#95;3</a>)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1950"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/ipmconversion/#ac9b8b45ddc556a9fa8375d7b8695fcd5">IPMConversion</a>(0, 0, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a739201f9c14177326c5b3dd889dc51a5">SystemZ::IPM&#95;CC</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1951"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CCMask == (CCValid &amp; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#aedfe0ac9b427e32574e7eafa44518c95">SystemZ::CCMASK&#95;2</a> | <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#abfe77bb849cf01dbc4b6fc10e091395e">SystemZ::CCMASK&#95;3</a>)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1952"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/ipmconversion/#ac9b8b45ddc556a9fa8375d7b8695fcd5">IPMConversion</a>(0, 0, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a739201f9c14177326c5b3dd889dc51a5">SystemZ::IPM&#95;CC</a> + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1953"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Deal with cases where we can add a value to force the sign bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to contain the right value.  Putting the bit in 31 means we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use SRL rather than RISBG(L), and also makes it easier to get a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 0/-1 value, so it has priority over the other tests below.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These sequences rely on the fact that the upper two bits of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IPM result are zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t TopBit = uint64&#95;t(1) &lt;&lt; 31;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CCMask == (CCValid &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a14b31497ae4b898370352164acc3b5f8">SystemZ::CCMASK&#95;0</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemziseldagtodag-cpp-/ipmconversion/#ac9b8b45ddc556a9fa8375d7b8695fcd5">IPMConversion</a>(0, -(1 &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a739201f9c14177326c5b3dd889dc51a5">SystemZ::IPM&#95;CC</a>), 31);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CCMask == (CCValid &amp; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a14b31497ae4b898370352164acc3b5f8">SystemZ::CCMASK&#95;0</a> | <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a3e4f7a3f70ff22719bebc0dedfa6f5d4">SystemZ::CCMASK&#95;1</a>)))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Next try inverting the value and testing a bit.  0/1 could be</span></CodeLine>
